name: Directory Synchronizer Project File
summary: Project file created with AJC Directory Synchronizer, a folder synchronization program; contains information about two folders that can be synchronized automatically by the program; often used for keeping the same data on a desktop and laptop or for backup purposes.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Transfer to a Besta device that supports DSY files, such as Besta Electronic Dictionary
